26 When they Raided Epstein's Mansion, they found not only the Clinton in a blue dress painting, but also some books signed personally from Clinton to Maxwell. posted 37 minutes ago by sleepy_bob_ross 0 comments award share report block DoctorGodMode @DoctorGodMode • 4M @AdamParkhomenko In the Evidence from the Epstein Raid they found a signed copy of Bill Clinton's book - written to Ghislaine Maxwell. https://t.co/xm67sx7DuC FUNacceptable Views @AshLaughs79 • 1y The Clinton Foundation started as the Clinton Global Initiative. There are allegations that this foundation was started by Epstein & Ghislaine Maxwell. At the very least, they had early involvement in it.
